uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

hardware_revision_tlv.description: The vendor-specific hardware revision string as advertised by the endpoint

firmware_revision_tlv.description: The vendor-specific Firmware revision string as advertised by the endpoint

software_revision_tlv.description: The vendor-specific software revision string as advertised by the endpoint

serial_number_tlv.description: The vendor-specific serial number as advertised by the endpoint

manufacturer_name_tlv.description: The vendor-specific manufacturer name as advertised by the endpoint

model_name_tlv.description: The vendor-specific model name as advertised by the endpoint

asset_id_tlv.description: The vendor-specific asset tracking identifier as advertised by the endpoint
